name: Hyperdimensional Combat Vessel Arrow
description:
Travel across 3 areas and shoot enemies, destroy citadels and interact with the lone maintainer of all the space stations in the region in this top-down/side-scroller space shooter.

Controls:

Z - Shoot/Select

Arrow keys - Movement

Enter - Pause/Warp

X - Enter places

M - Mute sound

Developed for the GBJAM 5
